class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        horizontalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        verticalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        cnt_h, cnt_v = 1, 1
        res, h, v = 0, 0, 0
        lh, lv = len(horizontalCut), len(verticalCut)
        while h < lh or v < lv:
            if h < lh and (v >= lv or horizontalCut[h] >= verticalCut[v]):
                res += horizontalCut[h] * cnt_v
                h += 1
                cnt_h += 1
            else:
                res += verticalCut[v] * cnt_h
                v += 1
                cnt_v += 1
        return res
